targets.rawSql:
WITH RawData AS (
    SELECT 
        TimeUnix,
        DeviceID,
        SUM(Value) AS InterfaceBytesTotal
    FROM (
        SELECT 
            TimeUnix,
            ResourceAttributes['device.id'] AS DeviceID,
            Value
        FROM "default"."otel_metrics_sum"
        WHERE MetricName = 'ifInOctets'
        AND (TimeUnix >= $__fromTime AND TimeUnix <= $__toTime)
        AND (('All' LIKE '${DeviceSerial}') OR (ResourceAttributes['device.id'] LIKE '${DeviceSerial}'))
    )
    GROUP BY TimeUnix, DeviceID
)
SELECT 
    TimeUnix,
    DeviceID,
    if(prev_bytes IS NULL OR time_diff = 0, 0,
        (InterfaceBytesTotal - prev_bytes) / time_diff
    ) AS InterfaceBytesRate
FROM (
    SELECT 
        TimeUnix,
        DeviceID,
        InterfaceBytesTotal,
        lagInFrame(InterfaceBytesTotal) OVER (PARTITION BY DeviceID ORDER BY TimeUnix) AS prev_bytes,
        toUnixTimestamp64Nano(TimeUnix) - toUnixTimestamp64Nano(lagInFrame(TimeUnix) OVER (PARTITION BY DeviceID ORDER BY TimeUnix)) AS time_diff
    FROM RawData
)
ORDER BY TimeUnix ASC;

WITH RawData AS (
    SELECT 
        TimeUnix,
        DeviceID,
        SUM(Value) AS InterfaceBytesTotal
    FROM (
        SELECT 
            TimeUnix,
            ResourceAttributes['device.id'] AS DeviceID,
            Value
        FROM "default"."otel_metrics_sum"
        WHERE MetricName = 'ifOutOctets'
        AND (TimeUnix >= $__fromTime AND TimeUnix <= $__toTime)
        AND (('All' LIKE '${DeviceSerial}') OR (ResourceAttributes['device.id'] LIKE '${DeviceSerial}'))
    )
    GROUP BY TimeUnix, DeviceID
)
SELECT 
    TimeUnix,
    DeviceID,
    if(prev_bytes IS NULL OR time_diff = 0, 0,
        (InterfaceBytesTotal - prev_bytes) / time_diff
    ) AS InterfaceBytesRate
FROM (
    SELECT 
        TimeUnix,
        DeviceID,
        InterfaceBytesTotal,
        lagInFrame(InterfaceBytesTotal) OVER (PARTITION BY DeviceID ORDER BY TimeUnix) AS prev_bytes,
        toUnixTimestamp64Nano(TimeUnix) - toUnixTimestamp64Nano(lagInFrame(TimeUnix) OVER (PARTITION BY DeviceID ORDER BY TimeUnix)) AS time_diff
    FROM RawData
)
ORDER BY TimeUnix ASC;

ORDER BY TimeUnix ASC;

WITH RawData AS (
    SELECT 
        TimeUnix,
        DeviceID,
        SUM(Value) AS InterfaceBytesTotal
    FROM (
        SELECT 
            TimeUnix,
            ResourceAttributes['device.id'] AS DeviceID,
            Value
        FROM "default"."otel_metrics_sum"
        WHERE MetricName = 'ifInOctets'

        AND (('All' LIKE '${DeviceSerial}') OR (ResourceAttributes['device.id'] LIKE '${DeviceSerial}'))

SELECT

    DeviceID,
    if(prev_bytes IS NULL OR time_diff = 0, 0,
        (InterfaceBytesTotal - prev_bytes) / time_diff

FROM (
    SELECT

        DeviceID,
        InterfaceBytesTotal,
        lagInFrame(InterfaceBytesTotal) OVER (PARTITION BY DeviceID ORDER BY TimeUnix) AS prev_bytes,

    FROM RawData

ORDER BY TimeUnix ASC;

targets.formattedQuery: SELECT $timeSeries as t, count() FROM $table WHERE $__timeFilter(time) GROUP BY t ORDER BY t
targets.rawQuery:
SELECT 
    time AS Time,
    8*(SUM(SumOctets)/5/60) AS value,
    concat(ApplicationName, ':', toString(d.name)) AS metric
FROM livenx_flowdb.basic_entity_app_5m_dist
JOIN livenx_flowdb.dscp AS d ON toUInt8(Dscp) = d.dscp
WHERE time >= 1708095952 AND time <= 1708096852 AND (ApplicationName, Dscp) GLOBAL IN 
(
    SELECT
        ApplicationName, Dscp
    FROM livenx_flowdb.basic_entity_app_5m_dist
    JOIN livenx_flowdb.dscp AS d ON toUInt8(Dscp) = d.dscp
    WHERE time >= 1708095952 AND time <= 1708096852 AND 
    (('All' LIKE 'All') OR (ApplicationName LIKE 'All')) AND 
    (('All' LIKE 'All') OR (d.name LIKE 'All')) AND 
    (('All' LIKE 'All') OR (DeviceSerial LIKE 'All'))
    GROUP BY ApplicationName, Dscp
    ORDER BY SUM(SumOctets) DESC
    LIMIT 10
)

GROUP BY Time,metric
ORDER BY Time
targets.rawSql:
SELECT
    time AS Time,
    8*(SUM(SumOctets)/${Granularity}/60) AS Traffic,
    'Basic' AS metric
FROM livenx_flowdb.basic_entity_app_${Granularity}m_dist
WHERE $__timeFilter(time) AND
    (('All' LIKE '${Dscp}') OR (toString(Dscp) LIKE '${Dscp}')) AND 
    (('All' LIKE '${Application}') OR (ApplicationName LIKE '${Application}')) AND 
    (('All' LIKE '${DeviceSerial}') OR (DeviceSerial LIKE '${DeviceSerial}'))
GROUP BY Time,metric
ORDER BY Time

SELECT
    time AS Time,
    8*(SUM(SumOctets)/${Granularity}/60) AS Traffic,
    'AVC' AS metric
FROM livenx_flowdb.avc_entity_app_${Granularity}m_dist
WHERE $__timeFilter(time) AND
    (('All' LIKE '${Dscp}') OR (toString(Dscp) LIKE '${Dscp}')) AND 
    (('All' LIKE '${Application}') OR (ApplicationName LIKE '${Application}')) AND 
    (('All' LIKE '${DeviceSerial}') OR (DeviceSerial LIKE '${DeviceSerial}'))
GROUP BY Time,metric
ORDER BY Time

SELECT
    time AS Time,
    8*(SUM(SumOctets)/${Granularity}/60) AS Traffic,
    'MediaNet' AS metric
FROM livenx_flowdb.medianet_entity_app_${Granularity}m_dist
WHERE $__timeFilter(time) AND
    (('All' LIKE '${Dscp}') OR (toString(Dscp) LIKE '${Dscp}')) AND 
    (('All' LIKE '${Application}') OR (ApplicationName LIKE '${Application}')) AND 
    (('All' LIKE '${DeviceSerial}') OR (DeviceSerial LIKE '${DeviceSerial}'))
GROUP BY Time,metric
ORDER BY Time

targets.formattedQuery: SELECT $timeSeries as t, count() FROM $table WHERE $__timeFilter(time) GROUP BY t ORDER BY t
targets.rawQuery:
SELECT 
    ApplicationName,
    d.name AS Dscp,
    SUM(SumOctets)/5 AS TotalBytes,
    SUM(SumFlowCount) AS TotalFlows,
    SUM(SumPackets)/5 AS TotalPackets,
    SUM(SumOctets)*8/5/60 AS AverageBitRate,
    AVG(SumPackets)/5/60 AS AveragePacketRate,
    MAX(SumOctets)*8/5/60 AS PeakBitRate,
    MAX(SumPackets)/5/60 AS PeakPacketRate
FROM livenx_flowdb.basic_entity_app_5m_dist as f
JOIN livenx_flowdb.dscp AS d ON toUInt8(f.Dscp) = d.dscp
WHERE
    time >= 1708095989 AND time <= 1708096889 AND 
    (('All' LIKE 'All') OR (ApplicationName LIKE 'All')) AND 
    (('All' LIKE 'All') OR (d.name LIKE 'All')) AND  
    (('All' LIKE 'All') OR (DeviceSerial LIKE 'All'))
GROUP BY ApplicationName, Dscp
LIMIT 1000
targets.rawSql:
SELECT
    DeviceSerial,
    8*(SUM(SumOctets)/${Granularity}/60) AS Traffic,
    SUM(SumFlowCount) AS FlowCount
FROM livenx_flowdb.basic_entity_app_${Granularity}m_dist
WHERE $__timeFilter(time) AND
    (('All' LIKE '${Dscp}') OR (toString(Dscp) LIKE '${Dscp}')) AND 
    (('All' LIKE '${Application}') OR (ApplicationName LIKE '${Application}')) AND 
    (('All' LIKE '${DeviceSerial}') OR (DeviceSerial LIKE '${DeviceSerial}'))
GROUP BY DeviceSerial

targets.rawSql:
SELECT
    Fetch_Time,count()
FROM inventory_db.Audit_Log
WHERE 
    (('All' LIKE '${DeviceSerial}') OR (Device_Serial LIKE '${DeviceSerial}'))
GROUP BY Fetch_Time

    *
FROM inventory_db.Audit_Log
WHERE 
    (('All' LIKE '${DeviceSerial}') OR (Device_Serial LIKE '${DeviceSerial}'))

list.definition:
SELECT DISTINCT Dscp AS Dscp FROM livenx_flowdb.basic_entity_app_${Granularity}m_dist as f
WHERE
       $__timeFilter(time)
